summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered on September 6, 2002. The total charges amount to $12.73 after discounts, and it includes details about the shipment and payment due date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the FedEx invoice for shipping services, indicating his involvement in shipping activities.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843

The invoice indicates that Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient and billing account holder.
